mapper.select: SELECT BO.BOARD_SEQ , BO.BOARD_TYPE , BO.BOARD_TITLE , BO.BOARD_CONTENT , BO.BOARD_SECRET_YN , BO.BOARD_DEL_YN , COALESCE(BO.INQ_CNT, 0) AS INQ_CNT , BO.REG_ID , BO.REG_NM , BO.REG_DT , BO.UPD_ID , BO.UPD_NM , BO.UPD_DT , M.MENU_SEQ , M.MENU_NAME , M.MENU_BOARD_TYPE AS boardType FROM BOARD BO LEFT JOIN MENU M on M.MENU_BOARD_TYPE = BO.BOARD_TYPE WHERE BO.BOARD_DEL_YN = 'N' AND MENU_USE_YN = 'Y' AND BO.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} ORDER BY BO.BOARD_SEQ DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT NOTICE_SEQ , NOTICE_TYPE , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENTS , COALESCE(INQ_CNT, 0) AS INQ_CNT , REG_ID , REG_DATE , FILE_IDX , USE_YN FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = ${boardType} ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 2

SELECT bo.BOARD_SEQ , bo.BOARD_TYPE , bo.BOARD_TITLE , bo.BOARD_CONTENT , bo.BOARD_SECRET_YN , bo.BOARD_DEL_YN , bo.INQ_CNT , bo.REG_ID , bo.REG_NM , bo.REG_DT , bo.UPD_ID , bo.UPD_NM , bo.UPD_DT , bo.PASSWORD , bo.FILE_IDX , FT.ORI_NM , FT.SAVE_NM , FT.FILE_PATH FROM BOARD bo LEFT JOIN FILE FT ON bo.FILE_IDX = FT.FILE_IDX WHERE bo.BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}
SELECT BOARD_SEQ , PASSWORD , REG_ID FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}
UPDATE BOARD SET FILE_IDX = null WHERE FILE_IDX = #{fileIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT MENU_SEQ , MENU_NAME , MENU_URL , MENU_SITE , MENU_BOARD_TYPE FROM MENU WHERE MENU_SITE = 'U' AND MENU_USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CAST(MENU_ORDER AS SIGNED)
SELECT M.MENU_BOARD_TYPE AS BOARDTYPE , M.MENU_NAME FROM MENU M LEFT JOIN BOARD BO ON M.MENU_BOARD_TYPE = BO.BOARD_TYPE WHERE M.MENU_USE_YN = 'Y' AND M.MENU_SITE = 'U' GROUP BY M.MENU_BOARD_TYPE

SELECT BANNER_SEQ , BANNER_URL , BN.FILE_IDX , REG_ID , BN.REG_DT , FT.ori_nm , FT.save_nm , FT.FILE_PATH , BANNER_NAME FROM BANNER BN LEFT JOIN FILE FT ON BN.FILE_IDX = FT.FILE_IDX ORDER BY BANNER_ORDER ASC

select re.REPLY_SEQ ,re.BOARD_TYPE ,re.BOARD_SEQ ,re.REPLY_CONTENTS ,re.REG_USER ,re.REG_USER_NAME ,re.REG_DATE ,re.MOD_USER ,re.MOD_DATE from reply re where re.BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} AND USE_YN = 'Y' order by re.REPLY_SEQ
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET USE_YN = 'N' , MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE REPLY_SEQ = #{replySeq}

SELECT NOTICE_TITLE FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1
